Package au.edu.anu.twcore.ecosystem.runtime

Interface DataTracker<T,​M>

All Superinterfaces:
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.observer.Observable<DataReceiver<T,​M>>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Resettable, SimulationTracker, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Singleton<M>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataTracker, AggregatorDataTracker, DataTracker0D, DataTracker2D, DataTrackerXY, GraphDataTracker, SamplerDataTracker, SpaceDataTracker
public interface DataTracker<T,​M> extends fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.observer.Observable<DataReceiver<T,​M>>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Singleton<M>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Resettable, SimulationTracker

An interface for any object that sends data through messages to other objects of the DataReceiver class. Inherits the addObserver(...) and sendMessage(...) methods from Observable.

It assumes a 2 step process:

  1. The data tracker sends metadata to its observers. The observers use this metadata to perform internal setups preparing them to receive future data messages.
  2. The data tracker sends data messages to its observers. These data are processed with the help of the metadata sent at step 1.

In this process, the implicit assumption is that there is usually one metadata message sent prior to many data messages. The exact meaning of metadata and data is left to implementing classes.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 3 sept. 2019
